It all started in the second quarter of 2021, that we began concentrating on the metaverse environment. The metaverse trend, as defined by us, is the rise in significance of virtual reality and digital persistence in enabling alternative settings and identities for communicable human experiences. Although the idea of the metaverse can seem incomprehensibly "far away" to some observers, the reality is that we now live among proto-metaverses and that the future will arrive before we're really prepared for it.

Our MVP has also attracted developers from Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.

bio:
Every successful business starts with a vision. Wdragon is the full-stack software team that you partner with to make it a reality.

With the experience in building digital products such as web & mobile apps, prototypes, and MVPs, complex WordPress websites, or e-commerce solutions, we help companies grow.

 
CLIENTS
Our first goal is understanding our customers’ business objectives. Are you trying to make more sales, grow your audience - how will this project make a positive impact on your business. Once we understand what you want to achieve, we delve deeply to understand your functional and non functional requirements.

Understanding your business at this deep level is a key element to ensure that we align to help you succeed.

The Wdragon team work in a professional, yet friendly manner, providing you with full transparency of our processes and progress. 


SKILLSET
We’ve got technology covered, Wdragon experts cover technologies and skills as

- React, Angular, Vue, ECMAScript
- Mobile: iOS, Android, React Native
- PWA
- Node, PHP, Ruby on Rails
- WordPress, BigCommerce, Shopify, WooCommerce
- HTML5, CSS3, ITCSS

We support clients with stunning UX/UI design, provide the guidance of certified project managers, and ensure proper code maintenance and marketing/SEO of their digital products.


PARTNERSHIP
We recommend two main cooperation models to our clients. We can either build your project from scratch, or help scale your team by augmenting extra talent.

bio:
DATA SCIENTIST: 10+ years experience. Machine learning, Bayesian models, neural nets, random forest. I work primarily in Python with pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, etc. I can also work in R and many other statistical language. I am proficient in C++.

I specialize in building and implementing statistical models that involve a mixture of classical and modern computational tools. Beginning with classical methods and an effective, real world understanding of the problem, I then layer more sophisticated tools on top to deliver powerful machine learning solutions.

PHYSICIST: Imaging, optics (classical and quantum), biophysics, X-ray physics, medical physics.

Tutoring is both a hobby and a passion. I tutor in Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Data Science. Rates vary depending upon my availability.
I require a SafePay deposit.

abstrac: Book Design Master - Adobe, DTP, Indesign, Books, Covers, Typesetting, Photoshop, Amazon CreateSpace, Ingram Lightning Source, Kindle, Lulu, MOBI, ePub, Banners, Print on Demand, PDFx,Text
bio:
I'm backed up with 15 years of expertise in book interior design and layout, cover design, web banners, print advertising, e-covers and more. I guarantee that your job will be done on time and with zero worries.

I do design and formatting for self-publishers or publishers who plan to submit their books to online book printers (Print On Demand)  such as Create Space, Lightning Source/Ingram Spark, Lulu, Blurb or regular offset printer. I can assist up to the last step of uploading your book files to your printer.

You're here because you (or your clients) have a book, cover, print material, graphics, illustration or e-book to be done. It might be update of an existing book or material, or something completely new. Either way, you need RESULTS, and you need them yesterday.  The following testimonials (taken directly from my freelance profiles) prove that I can deliver those results, increasing your profits and making your product look good - on time and with zero worries.

"FANTASTIC experience! Velin did GREAT work, was easy to work with, communicated well...the book he formatted for me looks WONDERFUL! 5 stars!"

"Velin is not longer consider a "Freelancer" he is being part of our team for more than 4 years now. He continues supporting our projects with his quality work and being a great asset for our company HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!"

"Fantastic working with Velin..extremely professional and more importantly for this task, highly Creative!! Love to work with him again and am sure this will happen very soon. Kudos!!"

***********

I have extensive experience in creating print graphics and art combined with a thorough understanding of the most of up to date digital software and a clear understanding of 4/color CMYK printing. You can be sure that your job is done from start to finish by a professional with years of experience.

I have freelance background with more than 400 all 100% positive feedback at different sites including this one.
100% or step by step milestone escrow deposit at the start of the job.

bio:
9+ years of experience working as a freelancer. I am a full-time freelancer and am available 40 hrs/week. I am mainly working with Data Entry, Web Research, Lead Generation, and Email List Building.

►I am an expert in the following services:
✔ Lead generation, Email list building, and Prospect building.
✔ I have access to LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Seamless, and many other tools
✔ Web research, Internet research, and Market research.
✔ Database management, Organization, and Cleaning.
✔ Working with Excel and formulas.
✔.VBA Programming, Google sheet, Google Script Programming.
✔ Word formatting.
✔ Data entry from any source to Excel and Google sheet.
✔ PDF conversion into Excel and Word.
✔ Working with different CRMs, including Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, and Docusign.
✔ Product uploading and listing on e-commerce platforms including Shopify, Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Noon.com, Magento, WordPress, and a couple of others.

abstrac: A writing that touches the crowd
bio:
The biggest marketing challenge for B2B companies is delivering customer-centric messaging. Instead of talking about what their customers want, they talk about themselves. 

My job is to flip that script.

With B2B buyers now doing most of their research online, connecting through copy is incredibly important. B2B copy must be relevant to what customers care about the most, show the potential results, and provide a thorough education, all before the first sales call is booked. 

I write copy that shows decision-makers a solution to their most pressing needs with relevant, customer-centric messaging that connects clients to your brand and drives business results. 

Together, we will:
- Target specific audiences
- Create a narrative that your audience connects with
- Effectively communicate your client’s most pressing business problems
- Show customers how to get to their desired state
- Give results/evidence that helps customers make the right decision
- Create a lasting impact for your business

My experience includes B2B copywriting for reputable firms.

Other services I offer include;
   > B2B Marketing
   > Outbound Sales Specialism
   > Telemarketing
   > Sales Consultancy

I work 35hours in a week with a team of experts.

I charge $25 per hour.

We can also set a milestone to complete a task at a fixed price.

abstrac: My mission is to help my clients achieve their goals by providing them with the best writing services tailored to suit their individual preferences.
bio:
I grew up writing. 

From an early age, I began to fill the back of my school books with poems, motivational quotes and cartoon drawings. My final year in the university, I decided to turn my passion into a profitable skill. I took content writing courses and got mentored. Then, I went ahead to sharpen my skill through writing and writing again. I have never stopped writing since.

Over the past seven years, I have provided content writing services for a range of individuals, blog and website owners. I also provide academic writing services and write poems and stories.

Let me know how I can help you achieve your dreams with words.

abstrac: I will push the boundaries of your career/business!
bio:
Dear Esteemed Visitor,

Many thanks for stopping by.

You see, my passion for writing started way back when I realized that I could influence people's decisions with useful, actionable pieces. Indeed, I have been around for nearly a decade. With no plans to rest on my laurels, I always hone my writing dexterity to stand out. 

It goes without saying that I have a degree in Information Technology, I am a trained digital marketer, and I am also a trained software documentation specialist. Did I fail to mention that I have done several copywriting courses? Yes, I have.

Away from virtual and in-person classes, I have written lots of ICO white papers, theses, literature reviews, ebooks, journals, etc. I have also analyzed and optimized websites. To be precise, I have worked for Crypto Block Wire, Harmani Associates, Jabez Publishing House, Zhou Wellness, Wondershare, etc. Today, they form the bulk of my happy clients shown on my Feedback page. 

At this juncture, this is why you should hire me: 

- You will enjoy journals, articles, web content and ebooks that are completely free from plagiarism and errors

 - As a job seeker or a business executive in need of a professional resume writer, you get that edge over other candidates

- You effortlessly engage your web visitors and convert them to paying customers, with my invaluable, high-converting content/copy pieces

- Plus, you can now focus on other areas of your business or go on that vacation with your loved ones knowing full well that I have got you covered

- You join the long list of happy buyers who attest to my ability to quickly improve businesses

- Yes, you have on your team an intelligent freelancer who learns fast, adapts to fast-paced environment and works round the clock to deliver excellent results

- You don't have to pay through your nose to get results because I have a budget-friendly fee.

If this isn't a win-win deal, then what is? 

So, contact me now to learn more about my special offers!

I love to work via Guru and I also like having my SafePay funded before getting to work.

My preferred communication channels are Guru, Skype, Zoom, email, and WhatsApp.

abstrac: Doing your best work while being your best self.
bio:
I graduated from University of Southern Queensland, Australia with a Bachelor of Information Technology. 

I hold a Bachelor Degree of Information Technology and have been working as a freelance graphic designer for several years and I have experience creating logo, flyers, banners, business card and digital photo manipulation for a number of satisfied clients. However, my specialty is logo and banner design.

I stay updated on all the latest trends and technology associated with graphic designs and I can use Photoshop, After Effect and similar programs proficiently. I am a creative, self-starter who provides strong attention to detail and design quality. I know the best layout and font to use based on the size of the piece and on how you plan to use the design. 

I am self-motivated and have the ability to stay organized, which means I can work on more than one project at once and still meet tight deadlines.

I have included my portfolio with my resume and feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience. 

Thank you 


Yours truly,

Choo Suan Hee

I have excellent interpersonal skills and communication skills with the ability to follow directions completely to ensure the artwork meets your needs perfectly. I also have the patience and skills to make changes if something is not quite right or if the final design is not exactly what was expected.

My rate is usually $19/hour but I can be flexible based on your needs.
